zh.name: 创意头脑风暴
zh.desc: 辅助进行产品创意、项目起名和复杂问题的发散性思考。
zh.full_desc: 灵感枯竭了？该技能提供了多种创意思维框架（如 SCAMPER 甚至逆向思维），帮助你快速生成大量点子。无论是给项目起个酷名字，还是寻找产品的下一个突破点，它都是你最好的数字创意伙伴。

en.name: Brainstorming
en.desc: Assisted creative thinking for product ideas, naming, and complex problem-solving.
en.full_desc: Running out of ideas? This skill provides various creative thinking frameworks (like SCAMPER) to help you generate sparks. Whether it's picking a cool project name or finding the next big feature, it's your best digital creative partner.
